mapper.select: select count(*) as total from MEMBER where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into Users(id, pw, name, nick, phone, addrZipnum, addrBasic, addrDetail, birth, regdate, com, grade) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{phone}, #{addrZipnum}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail}, #{birth}, #{regdate}, #{com}, #{grade});
